dmca.title: DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: shahin m [mailto:shahin-m@evoicecafe.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2006 6:16 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint

this is where the software is installed:
http://69.93.169.36/a.xml

this is a sample of the software in use:
http://69.93.169.36/ir/index.asp?site=parsichat

above sample was one of our customers, they have signed up

there are several others as well they have stollen from us by offering lower
prices!

furhter more when you login to these chat rooms for the first time an active
x is downloaded on the users computer, this active x has been licensed to us
by lotuspond and we are liable for any missuse of this applet, your customer
can "hack" the computer of users that enter the chat using this active x
file.

I am attaching to this email:

1- a screen capture of thie active x file
2- a screen capute of the .xml file showing the software is licensed to us
3- bank wire showing the payment for the software license



> Please provide me with the specific URL which is infringing upon your 
> copyright.
> 
>  To Whom It May Concern:
> 
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does 
> not substantially comply with the required notification elements of 
> the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not 
> identify (a) the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and 
> (b) the material that is claimed to be infringing, and information 
> reasonably sufficient to permit the The Planet to locate the said 
> material.
> 
> Legal Response Team
> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
> 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: shahin m [mailto:shahin-m@evoicecafe.com]
> Sent: Friday, March 03, 2006 4:17 AM
> To: Legal Response
> Subject: Re: DMCA Complaint
> 
> Please let me know why the information I have given you not complete,  
> I was hoping I did not have to go through our attorney, kindly 
> explaind what was missing in our letter.
> 
> Regards
> shahin
> 
> > To Whom It May Concern:
> >
> > Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does 
> > not substantially comply with the required notification elements of 
> > the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
> >
> > Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of 
> > your claim.
> >
> > Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal> 
> > www.theplanet.com/legal.
> >
> > Legal Response Team
> >
> > THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
